This file is part of Chronos (Myreality Game Development Toolkit). Chronos is licenced under GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE (Version 3) For more information visit http://dev.my-reality.de/chronos An FTP game updater to update the game by an open FTP connection.
